body.name: ABOTOCUP 32oz Water Bottle with Powder Coated, Fit in Any Car Cup Holder, Water Bottle with Straw Lids, Stainless Steel Insulated Water Flask Double Wall Leak-proof BPA Free to Keep Cold&Hot

features: 【T-SHAPED FOR CUP HOLDER】 Designed with a sleek and slim outline, this T-shaped water bottle fits in most car cupholders. ABOTOCUP T-shaped water flask suitable for outdoor when driving, cycling, beach holidays, and camping. 32 oz large capacity keeps your adventures running longer.

【VACUUM INSULATED STAINLESS STEEL】The unique double-walled vacuum insulation of the metal water bottle keeps the beverage hot for 12 hours and ice-cold for 24 hours. Crafted with 100% non-toxic BPA-free plastics & durable food-grade 18/8 stainless steel, Metal water bottle can keep taste of the beverage itself which avoid flavor transfer.

【2 LEAK-PROOF LIDS】ABOTOCUP insulated water bottle provide a different drinking experience with two lids that are fully leak-proof and designed for effortless drinking. Easy to use one-handed or hands-free drinking even when you're busy. Perfect for all indoor and outdoor activities.

【POWDER-COATED & NO-SWEAT】 Powder coating comes with a firm grip that won't slip even in sweaty palms, ensuring safe driving. This 32oz gym water bottle won't get your purse, shirt and backpack wet when you put ice in the bottle.

【EASY TO CLEAN】Stainless steel water bottle with straw brush, making you to easily wash inside of straw and Bottle Mouth without worrying about residues of beverages. If you have any questions, please contact us and ABOTOCUP team will respond within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits my cup holder!
reviews.reviewText: It’s hard to find a good quality cup that is large enough to keep me hydrated on long road trips that will also fit in a standard cup holder. This one does it. I like it so much I bought 2 so my wife and I don’t have to fight over who gets to use it. 2 of these in a day will give me the appropriate amount of hydration I need. When it tips over it doesn’t spill out. A few cubes of ice and my drink stays cold all day long. The quality is great and it holds up to a good bit of punishment and abuse. It’s a solid piece of equipment. Try not to drop it on your toe. It likely wont affect the bottle, but your toe will hate you for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great water bottle.
reviews.reviewText: Love my new water bottle. I love that it holds 32oz but still fits in my cupholder in my car. The mouth of the bottle is bigger than my last one, which makes it easier to fill with ice and water from my refrigerator icemaker. No more ice on the floor! The handle is flexible, which makes it less breakable. My last water bottle handle broke When I dropped it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice cup, holds ice well, easy to fit in vehicle cup holder. Love the different lid options and that I can keep the spout closed to keep germs out.Purchased a 2nd cup in different color for grandson.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super solid cup
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic bottle!! It doesn't leak, I love the different lid options, the sturdy handle, it fits in my car cup holder, and has a very pretty look.There are a few minor downsides to it, however, it doesn't keep ice from melting as slowly as other insulated cups (maybe about 12 hours or so), it's got a skinny bottom so it's a little top heavy and rattles around in a cup holder if it's not a snug fit. Super minor on the issues, overall this is one of the most solid cups I've found and I would recommend it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really amazing bottle design
reviews.reviewText: This bottle has it all, straw, insulation, perfect design, includes so many ways to grab hold, it has a solid handle like a mug, it has a braded rope with a carabiner and the lid even has its own loop all of the materials feel great good quality, fastened to the thing. the only thing that could break on this thin is a compass that is on the clip of the braid handle, and I dropped the bottle on that thing and its plastic so it shattered but really who needs a compass on the bottle??

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits in the car cup holder!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for our needs! Large capacity (32oz), stainless steel and keeps water cold all day, easily removable top with two different caps, either straw or spout. Our two bottles fit side by side in our car console with no problem!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits in car cup holder
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a water bottle that doesn't leak and will fit in my car cup holder. This does both. It fits and works better than other brands starting with a T that are supposed to be leak proof/resistant.This has a hook spring system that keeps the bottle closed. It also has a clasp to ensure it stays closed. This is well designed and worth the extra few $ to ensure it doesn't leak around the lid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent but room for improvement
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this water bottle, and while it serves its basic purpose, there are a few aspects that leave room for improvement.On the positive side, the design is simple and functional. The bottle is easy to carry, and the cap seals tightly, preventing leaks during transport. The material used is durable, and I appreciate that it's easy to clean, maintaining hygiene over time.However, there are a couple of drawbacks. First, the size of the bottle's opening is quite narrow, making it difficult to add ice cubes or clean thoroughly. A wider mouth would not only facilitate cleaning but also make it more versatile for different beverages.Lastly, while the bottle claims to keep beverages cold for an extended period, I found that it doesn't live up to this promise as effectively as I had hoped. It's decent for short outings, but for longer durations, the insulation could be improved.In summary, this water bottle is functional but falls short in a few key areas. With some refinements in design and insulation capabilities, it has the potential to be a more reliable and versatile hydration solution. I would give it a three-star rating as it meets basic expectations but has room for enhancement.

UPDATE- after the seller read my review they refunded me 100% for my cup. I ordered a new one. Fingers crossed that both tops come this time 😃. I love the cup!! The reason I picked this one is because it came with the two different tops. Missing the top I wanted without the straw 🙁
